author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

Change of DQM configuration in order to have (CT)PPS properly configured also for Offline plots.
To be tested with #27591 

#### PR validation:

Tested on data with runTheMatrix on workflows 136.867 (2018) and 136.801 (2017)

@forthommel @jfernan2

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Backport of #27619
title: [106x] including ctpps in DQMOffline standard conf
